title: New: Yuma X – Swimming Pool
content:
What with all the awesome electronic music coming out of Australia over the course of the past couple of years (we’re talking Klo, Autumn, Tora etc.

), it was only a matter of time before one of the acts really nailed it, and Aussie duo Yuma X (Lucy & Jake) have done just that, on their debut Swimming Pool. A rework/cover of a track originally released back in 2008, it’s delicate and lovelorn, all underpinned by some solid production. Check it out below.

Follow our Spotify On Repeat playlist for a selection of the current hottest tracks.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
